Title: ‘Smothered, strangulated and their throats slit’
Content: Autopsy findings of 238 foetuses and newborns abandoned in the posh south Delhi area between 1996-2012 point towards possible female foeticide in the Capital.A recent study by the All India Institute
Author: Bindu Shajan Perappadan
Description: Autopsy findings of 238 foetuses and newborns abandoned in the posh south Delhi area between 1996-2012 point towards possible female foeticide in the Capital.A recent study by the All India Institute
